mapper.select: SELECT A.plant_nickname AS plantNickName, B.odata_image AS plantPic, B.odata_name AS plantName, CEIL(COUNT(*) OVER() / #{size}) AS totalPage, COUNT(*) OVER() AS totalElement FROM plant_master A INNER JOIN opendata B ON A.plant_odata_seq = B.odata_seq WHERE plant_user_seq = #{userSeq} ORDER BY A.plant_seq LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}

SELECT A.plant_nickname AS plantNickName, B.odata_image AS plantPic, B.odata_name AS plantName, A.plant_etc AS etc FROM plant_master A INNER JOIN opendata B ON A.plant_odata_seq = B.odata_seq WHERE A.plant_user_seq = #{userSeq} AND B.plant_seq = #{plantSeq}
